info.name: Nexthooks
info.summary: Integrate your Nextcloud instance with external systems using Webhooks
info.description:
This app allows a Nextcloud instance to call an external service via a HTTP(S) POST request whenever an event of a given type occurs.
Outgoing webhooks can be triggered by either Nextcloud's internal events specified in config.php or by Flow actions defined in the admin UI.
info.author: Sebastian Sternfeld
